com.flamingOctoIronman.eventFramework

Class EventBusService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flamingOctoIronman.eventFramework.EventBusService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoreEventBusService, InputEventBusService

    public abstract class EventBusService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to handle the subscribing and publishing of events. It provides the basic framework to create an event bus for a given module.
    Author:
    Quint
